text: Ginger is a 1935 American comedy-drama movie directed by Lewis Seiler and starring Jane Withers, O. P. Heggie, Jackie Searl, Katharine Alexander, Walter Woolf King. It was distributed by Fox Film Corporation. == Other websites == * Category:1935 comedy movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Seiler
title: Ginger (1935 movie)
